title: Redesign website inspired by sherrishowtv.com layout and structure

requirements.summary: Analyze sherrishowtv.com and implement similar layout structure including navigation patterns, hero section styling, content organization, and overall page architecture
acceptanceCriteria: Website layout mirrors the structural patterns observed in sherrishowtv.com
Navigation follows similar placement and interaction patterns
Hero section adopts comparable visual hierarchy and layout
Content sections are organized with similar spacing and flow

file_operations.description: Update the Layout component to match sherrishowtv.com page architecture with updated spacing, container widths, and structural organization while maintaining Header, Navigation, and Footer integration
Add custom spacing values, container sizes, and layout utilities to match sherrishowtv.com design patterns while preserving existing color palette and animation configurations

requirements.summary: Update Home page to match sherrishowtv.com visual styling and content arrangement while maintaining 'Sittin with Shireen' branding with fuchsia pink and orange colors
acceptanceCriteria: Home page layout structure reflects sherrishowtv.com design patterns
Brand colors (fuchsia pink and orange) are preserved throughout
Content sections follow similar visual hierarchy
Typography and spacing align with reference site aesthetics

file_operations.description: Redesign the Home page hero section, about section, and feature cards to match sherrishowtv.com layout patterns while maintaining existing brand colors (fuchsia pink and orange). Use the generated hero background image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-background.dim_1920x1080.png for the hero section background. Update typography hierarchy, section spacing, card layouts, and content organization to align with reference site aesthetics

Update global typography settings (font sizes, line heights, letter spacing) to match sherrishowtv.com text styling while preserving the existing OKLCH color system and fuchsia pink/orange brand colors

requirements.summary: Redesign Videos page gallery layout to match sherrishowtv.com video presentation style while keeping YouTube-style grid functionality

file_operations.description: Update the Videos page grid layout, spacing, and container structure to match sherrishowtv.com video gallery presentation while maintaining existing video fetching and playback functionality

Redesign VideoCard component styling including thumbnail presentation, play button overlay, aspect ratios, shadows, borders, and hover effects to match sherrishowtv.com video card aesthetics while preserving onPlay callback functionality

Update VideoPlayer modal styling to match sherrishowtv.com video player presentation including overlay darkness, player controls styling, and modal positioning while maintaining auto-play and controls functionality

requirements.summary: Update Header and Navigation components to match sherrishowtv.com header design, logo placement, and menu structure

Maintain the green logo (SwS Green Vector v1.png) and Internet Identity authentication functionality. Update spacing, padding, and alignment to match reference site

Update Navigation component styling to match sherrishowtv.com menu structure including link styling, spacing, hover effects, active states, sticky positioning behavior, and mobile responsive menu design. Maintain existing navigation links (Home, Videos, Store, Podcast, Admin) and role-based Admin link visibility

requirements.summary: Redesign Store page to match sherrishowtv.com merchandise presentation style while maintaining existing shopping cart and checkout functionality

Redesign ProductCard component to match sherrishowtv.com product card styling including image presentation, aspect ratios, product name and description typography, price display formatting, card borders, shadows, hover effects, and 'Add to Cart' button styling while preserving cart context functionality
